author: David
title: Restart Application in NW 7.3
text:
- Go to the SAP NetWeaver Administrator (http://127.0.0.1:50000/nwa)
 - "Configuration" > "Infrastructure" > "Application modules"
 - Search for the Name of the Application (e.g. shopadmin)
 - Select the Application and click "More Actions" > "View corresponding to Application"
 - And eventually click "Restart"

author: Chandu
title: Restart the application
text: How to restart the applications (b2b/user admin/ shop) in SAP Net weaver 7.3. I know how to restart applications in 7.0.
